attributes.action: implement ruling that means anyone entering any major footaball ground on a matchday will need to be screened for terriost threats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK has alreadt had its fair share of terroist attacks. Football grounds could be an easy target for terroism in the future because although there are checks for bottle caps and anything else that could be used as a missile in the staduim against the opposition. But as there is no checks for actuall terriost threats this will make football stadiums a very easy taget for this sort of thing.
